name: IMMZ.DT.20.Mumps
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated against Mumps, give Mumps vaccine

action.title: Immunize Patient for MUMPS - No Doses
action.description: Provide MUMPS immunizations - using the "MUMPS vaccine immunization - NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Age is greater than 11 months and less than 19 months old" and "MUMPS vaccine history" = "No-doses"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate Patient for MUMPS because no doses

action.title: Immunize Patient for MUMPS - One Dose
action.description: Provide MUMPS immunizations - using the "MUMPS vaccine immunization - ONE PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Age is greater than 11 months and less than 19 months old" and "MUMPS vaccine history" = "Month since last dose is greater than one."
expression.expression: Should vaccinate Patient for MUMPS a second time on a 2 dose scheme
